clauses.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.
clauses.clause_text:
You and Fastmail agree that any cause of action arising out of or related to these Terms and/or the Service must commence within one (1) year after the cause of action arose.
otherwise, such cause of action is permanently barred.</p

case.text: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

clauses.title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
clauses.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: Interfere with another member’s use and enjoyment of the Service or another individual’s or entity’s use and enjoyment of similar services.

case.text: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
You should be aware that your information may be held in databases which can
be accessed by other Fastmail companies and their partners or service providers
worldwide.
We employ people through different Fastmail companies and partners,
depending on where they live and those Fastmail companies and partners provide
service, at the same level of quality and with the same policies throughout
the world

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
Third Party analytics. We have engaged Innocraft's Matomo to analyse the activities of visitors to the Website through the use of cookies and other tracking technologies which enable them to monitor traffic to, and use of the Website. This enables us to evaluate usage of the Website. These third party cookies are governed by each third party's privacy or cookies policy.

Third party analytics are only used on our marketing and help pages.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: On 2024-09-21 04:31:06 UTC, Percyrempel (38092) wrote: It’s clear that big money can be made by understanding key strategies. Just like in the game Monkey Mart, where savvy decisions lead to success, your insights can unlock potential profits. Be sure to consider the points you’ve identified, as they might be the key to increased earnings in any venture.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text: Fastmail may terminate your access to any part or all of the Service and any related service(s) effective immediately if you fail to comply with these Terms, or where required to by law.</p

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.

We won't release any data without the required legal authorisation from an Australian court.
As an Australian company, we do not respond to US court orders

clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
destroying your personal information if it is no longer needed to provide you with our service;
  • destroying logging or other transactional information that may incidentally contain personal information in accordance with our schedules to clear such information;

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.description: Blocking tracking technologies will not negatively impact your use of the service.

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text:
Content uploaded by members

Fastmail does not claim ownership of content you submit or make available for inclusion on the Service

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You can download and export a copy of all of your data and content in your Fastmail account if you want to back it up or use it with a service outside of Fastmail

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.
clauses.clause_text:
List of cookies used

Below is a list of the cookies we set on our websites and the purpose of each:

fastmail.com
  • s_... – Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.
  • f_... – Security cookie – used as part of login and account recovery for keeping your account secure.
  • d_... – Stores the domain you came in with, so we can keep you on the same domain when you log out.
  • lang_... – Your preferred language to use for our interface once logged in.
  • theme_... – Your preferred theme to use for our interface once logged in.
  • campaign – If you came to our marketing site via a particular ad or campaign on a third party site, we set this so we can measure how effective the campaign was.
fastmailusercontent.com
  • sk_… Login cookie – this is used to authenticate your requests for message attachments and other user content.
topicbox.com
  • s_... – Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.
  • f_... – Security cookie – used as part of login and account recovery for keeping your account secure.
pobox.com
  • pobox_session — Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.
  • browsertoken — Security cookie – used as part of login and account recovery for keeping your account secure.
  • SpryMedia_DataTables_... — Used for temporary storage of view parameters for data views (no user data)
listbox.com
  • mason — Login cookie – this is used to allow you to log in to the Website.

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers
clauses.description: This service does respect the browser's Do Not Track header and disables all user tracking if it is enabled.
clauses.clause_text:
Matomo respects Do Not Track browser flags.
you may opt out of tracking by setting your browser to Do Not Track.

case.text: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected

can opt out of any non-essential communication by de-selecting the relevant checkbox in the settings page in the web interface;

clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any part of these Terms are determined to be invalid or unenforceable pursuant to applicable law including, but not limited to, the warranty disclaimers and liability limitations set forth above, then the invalid or unenforceable provision will be deemed superseded by a valid, enforceable provision that most closely matches the intent of the original provision and the remainder of these Terms shall continue in effect.
